MEASUREMENT: 6.25" H x 10" W x 2.75" D (16 cm H x 25.5 cm W x 7 cm D) Shoulder drop: 9" (23 cm) When it's doubledCannot worn as a cross body. Hologram sticker is attached inside the bag.The handbag comes with authenticity card, and care booklet.No dust bag.No box. MADE IN FRANCE The handbag has been redyed the exterior. Please read a description carefully before purchase. OVERALL CONDITION: GOOD CONDITION (Exterior: Good Condition: 7 out of 10) (Interior: Good Condition: 7 out of 10) Overall, the condition of the handbag is good pre-owned. This bag has been redyed at a shop other than chanel store. EXTERIOR: The redye work is great. No crack. Unless you look the bag very closely, it is hard to tell the bag has been redyed. Corners are great condition. Very tiny scuff mark is found on one corner.Scratch is found on the front. Please check a photo for reference. Gold chain is shiny, no discoloration.Otherwise, the exterior is good condition. INTERIOR: Interior found some sings of wear.Interior flap closure found some cracks on the edges. Please check a photo for reference. Interior white leather found minimal scratches. Small spot mark is found on the bottom. No odor.Interior slip closures are great condition. ***Warning on Recolored Merchandise*** All recolored items have been cleaned, primed, and then recolored. Since it is not possible to completely redo the coloring process for already colored leather, all recolored items have the new color applied over the old. (See *for detail). As a result, sometimes recoloring might be uneven or spotty, and wrinkled areas might develop cracks, especially if the bag exhibits marks of wear and tear prior to the recoloring. The recoloring paint is specially prepared for the purpose of recoloring bags and will not rub off on clothes. Please read the detailed information on the merchandise carefully, in addition to checking the image of the merchandise. Different people feel differently about signs of wear and tear, blemishes, or other imperfections. Those who prefer 100% perfect merchandise are asked to kindly refrain from ordering recolored items. We will not accept return of any merchandise on account of cracks or peeling off that developed after purchase. Please be mindful of the above warning before purchase. *Recoloring Process 1)Cleaning. 2)Priming (usually using the same-color, white, or colorless paint in order to stabilize the new-color paint). 3)Mixing the new color and applying it to the bag, using an airbrush or spray gun. After the new-color paint has been applied on the entire surface to be recolored, colorless coating material is applied. When the coating dries, the process is complete.
